links.*: The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings
The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power
The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)
The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[20 January|20]]''' - The official title of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power|''The Lord of the Rings'' television series]] is announced.

==February==
* '''[[13 February|13]]''' - The first official trailer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' is released online.
* '''[[28 February|28]]''' - [[Priscilla Tolkien]] dies.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 293|''Amon Hen'' 293]] is published.

==March==
* '''[[17 March|17]]''' - [[Amazon.com Incorporated|Amazon]] completes the acquisition of [[MGM]].
* '''[[22 March|22]]''' - The second edition of [[The One Ring (role-playing game)|''The One Ring''™ RPG]] is officially released.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].

==April==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 294|''Amon Hen'' 294]] is published.

==May==
* '''[[14 May|14]]''' - ''Middle-earth Strategy Battle Game: Defence of the North'' is released.

==June==
* '''[[24 June|24]]''' - ''[[The Great Tales Never End|The Great Tales Never End: Essays in Memory of Christopher Tolkien]]'' is published.

==July==
* '''[[14 July|14]]''' - The second official teaser trailer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' is released.
* '''[[28 July|28]]''' - Actor [[Bernard Cribbins]] dies.
* '''[[31 July|31]] -''[[The Chronology of The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[9 August|9]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2023]]'' is published.
* '''[[19 August|19]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)]]'' is released online.
* '''[[23 August|23]]''' - The third and final trailer of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' is released online.
* '''?''' - [[Embracer Group]] enters into an agreement to buy [[Middle-earth Enterprises]] from the Saul Zaentz Company.

==September==
* '''[[1 September|1]] - [[4 September|4]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2022]] is held online at [https://www.st-annes.ox.ac.uk/ St Anne's College], [[Oxford]].
* '''[[1 September|1]] - Episode one, "[[A Shadow of the Past]]", and episode two, "[[Adrift]]", of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' are simultaneously released online.'''
* '''[[1 September|1]]''' - A new and revised edition of ''[[The Complete Guide to Middle-earth]]'' by [[Robert Foster]] is published.
* '''[[9 September|9]]''' - The episode "[[Adar]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.
* '''[[16 September|16]]''' - The episode "[[The Great Wave]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.
* '''[[23 September|23]]''' - The episode "[[Partings]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - The episode "[[Udûn (episode)|Udûn]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.

==October==
* '''[[3 October|3]]''' - Production for the second season of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' series begins in the United Kingdom.
* '''[[7 October|7]]''' - The episode "[[The Eye]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - The episode "[[Alloyed]]" of ''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'' is released online.
* '''[[25 October|25]]''' - American animator [[Jules Bass]] dies.

==November==
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[The Fall of Númenor]]'' is published.
* '''[[15 November|15]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Before the Shadow]]'' is released online.

==December==
* '''[[14 December|14]]''' - Most of the production team of the second season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' is revealed.<ref>{{webcite|website=|articleurl=https://deadline.com/2022/12/the-lord-of-the-rings-the-rings-of-power-season-2-directors-episode-count-charlotte-brandstrom-sanaa-hamri-louise-hooper-1235198428/|articlename= ‘The Lord Of The Rings: The Rings Of Power’ Sets All-Female Directing Team, Reveals Episode Count For Season 2|author=Nellie Andreeva|dated=14 December 2022|accessed=17 January 2023}}</ref>
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 63|''Mallorn'' 63]] is published.
{{references}}
